scripts.build:web-app: pnpm --filter backend-core prisma:generate && pnpm --filter common build && pnpm --filter backend-core build && pnpm api:generate && pnpm --filter web-app build
scripts.build:worker-ec-order: pnpm --filter common build && pnpm --filter backend-core build && pnpm --filter worker-ec-order build
scripts.build:worker-item: pnpm --filter common build && pnpm --filter backend-core build && pnpm --filter worker-item build
scripts.build:worker-product: pnpm --filter common build && pnpm --filter backend-core build && pnpm --filter worker-product build
scripts.build:worker-transaction: pnpm --filter common build && pnpm --filter backend-core build && pnpm --filter worker-transaction build
scripts.build:worker-scheduled: pnpm --filter common build && pnpm --filter backend-core build && pnpm --filter worker-scheduled build
scripts.build:worker-external-ec: pnpm --filter common build && pnpm --filter backend-core build && pnpm --filter worker-external-ec build
scripts.build:worker-notification: pnpm --filter common build && pnpm --filter backend-core build && pnpm --filter worker-notification build

scripts.dev:worker-product: pnpm --filter worker-product build && pnpm --filter worker-product dev:start
scripts.dev:worker-item: pnpm --filter worker-item build && pnpm --filter worker-item dev:start
scripts.dev:worker-transaction: pnpm --filter worker-transaction build && pnpm --filter worker-transaction dev:start

scripts.dev:worker-notification: pnpm --filter worker-notification build && pnpm --filter worker-notification dev:start
